body.p: Hon- B. Magoffin Gov of Ky Whearas Sentence has been passed on Jonathan Greer for Manslaughter and Sentence to the Penetenra for the term of five years Mr Greer is an Old Man he has a large Family of Children a Kinde Father good Husband and neighbour much beloved as a neighbour I hope you will take his ^case^ under consideration as well as many others and let the Old man come back to his Family

Hon B.. Magoffin
Gov= of Ky
